S is for Sprite

Sprites are the objects in the game

The Greenhouse Games icon is added as a sprite in the game. Sprites have many features and can interact with other sprites. Every ABC lesson uses at least one sprite in the game.

Sprite Features
collision | dragging | jump | movement

Sprite Properties
acceleration | bounce | health | immovable | velocity

Sprite Position
x position | y position | z position

References

This lesson does not reference any other lessons.
